articles.content: Days after it secured $340 million in capital, B2B e-commerce unicorn Udaan has fired around 150 employees, or about 10 percent of its entire workforce, people aware of the developments told Moneycon… [+4060 chars]

articles.title: Stocks to Watch: SBI, Bata India, PB Fintech, ZEE, Sun Pharma, Lupin, and Others - News18
articles.description: Stocks to watch: Shares of firms like SBI, Bata India, PB Fintech, ZEE, Sun Pharma, Lupin, and others will be in focus on Monday's trade.
